item.title: ChanoMa
item.description: Overview Chubu Electric Power(C-EP) supplies electricity to 10 million households in Japan. ChanoMa (means “Living Room”) is a service for a dual-income households with a small children among their customers to tighten family bonds. This image is part of the projectâ€™s final design that I delivered to the client. A special feature of using Chanoma is that App plays and communicates with children when parents are busy. By recording children’s daily responses and sharing these with their parents, family members can understand their hidden feelings and preferences.
